title: Mistress of Mellyn & Kirkland Revels
description: Contains two stories by Victoria Holt. "As the train carried Martha Leigh -- heroine of Mistress of Mellyn - through the wooded hills of Devon, she could not help feeling a deep sense of foreboding." "The magnificent manor house on the Yorkshire moors, the ancestral home of the Rockwell family, was called Kirkland Revels."
author: Victoria Holt
